hello.text: {i}The next patient enters the room crawling on their four limbs.{n}You recognize the Netherworld Gardener.{s}

check.name: Check out her condition
check.text: {i}You notice her other, better half, is missing.{s}

operate.name: Try to operate her to remove Myon.
operate.text: {i}As you open her up, the ghost lunges at you.{n}It seems you're going to be its next victim{s}

magic.name: Try to perform a good old fashioned exorcism.
magic.text: {i}You try performing an exorcism.{n}After several hours of old incantations, you manage to purge the ghost out of her system successfully.{s}

medicine.name: Give her a purifying elixir.
medicine.text: {i}The medicine partially relieves Youmu from... herself ?{n}But the spirit's influence still lingers.{s}
